div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 133 Thessaly, 1966 Burial: early 3rd cent. B.C. (Hackens) Contents: 11+ AR. Incomplete hd. Alexander III: 1 dr. (Miletus) Lamia: 1 dr. Boeotia: 2 triob. Chalcis: 5 triob. Sicyon: 2 triob. Disposition: dispersed Information from T. Hackens
